> ⚠️ **Unstable**: This @std package is experimental and its API may change without a major version bump.

## Overview

<p>Utilities for dealing with <a href="https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Date" rel="nofollow"><code>Date</code></a> objects.</p>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class="pl-k">import</span> { dayOfYear, isLeap, difference, <span class="pl-smi">HOUR</span>, <span class="pl-smi">MINUTE</span>, <span class="pl-smi">SECOND</span> } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/datetime"</span>;
<span class="pl-k">import</span> { assertEquals } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/assert"</span>;

<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">dayOfYear</span>(<span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">Date</span>(<span class="pl-s">"2019-03-11T03:24:00"</span>)), <span class="pl-c1">70</span>);
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">isLeap</span>(<span class="pl-c1">1970</span>), <span class="pl-c1">false</span>);

<span class="pl-k">const</span> date0 <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">Date</span>(<span class="pl-s">"2018-05-14"</span>);
<span class="pl-k">const</span> date1 <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-k">new</span> <span class="pl-smi">Date</span>(<span class="pl-s">"2020-05-13"</span>);
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">difference</span>(date0, date1).<span class="pl-c1">years</span>, <span class="pl-c1">1</span>);

<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-smi">HOUR</span> <span class="pl-c1">/</span> <span class="pl-smi">MINUTE</span>, <span class="pl-c1">60</span>);
<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-smi">MINUTE</span> <span class="pl-c1">/</span> <span class="pl-smi">SECOND</span>, <span class="pl-c1">60</span>);
</code></pre>
